post:
CSpace Hostings has been open to business and online since 2012. Over the years we offered different locations to deploy high bandwidth servers for various customer segments.

We have now launched our Tallinn, Estonia [EE] location. We operate our own Network and Hardware based on Juniper MX for Core Routing with a mix of Juniper and Arista Switches in Tallinn, Estonia. We also offer Dedicated Servers, Colocation and IP Transit in Tallinn, Estonia.

Our SSD VPS are up and on discount, grab them before they are gone!!

We offer Double Bandwidth with 25% Discount to make the deal sweeter with Coupon: WLCTLL

Our SSD KVM Plans:

SSD #1 | 1GB RAM | 20GB SSD | 1vCores | 2TB Bandwidth NOW 5TB Bandwidth | €6.99/month NOW €5.25/month | Order Now

SSD #2 |2GB RAM | 35GB SSD | 1vCores | 2TB Bandwidth NOW 5TB Bandwidth | €9.99/month NOW €7.50/month | Order Now

SSD #3 | 4GB RAM | 50GB SSD | 2vCores | 5TB Bandwidth NOW 10TB Bandwidth | €14.99/month NOW €11.25/month | Order Now

SSD #4 | 8GB RAM | 80GB SSD | 3vCores | 5TB Bandwidth NOW 10TB Bandwidth | €19.99/month NOW €15/month |Order Now

SSD #5 | 16GB RAM | 80GB SSD | 4vCores | 8TB Bandwidth NOW 20TB Bandwidth | €29.99/month NOW €22.50/month | Order Now

Add-ons:
Bandwidth add-ons: +5TB @ €9.99/mo | +10TB @ €14.99/mo | +25TB @ €19.99/mo

All accounts include:
SolusVM Portal Access (Reinstall, Reboot, HTML5 Console) | KVM Virtualization | 1x IPv4 and 1x IPv6 | Best in class Support | No Setup Fees | No contracts | Full root access

Hardware Specification:
2x E5-2680 | 128GB RAM (Load Reduction) | 4x480GB HPE Mixed Use SSD (RAID10) | 4x1Gbps Uplink

OFFER CONDITIONS/IMPRINTS:
Offers are valid till: Monday, 28 February 2021 (subject to availability). NOW Covered with a 30 Days Money back Guarantee.
Discount is recurring till product is cancelled. Bandwidth will be updated on order deployment.
Prices are excluding Taxes such as VAT.
Payment via PayPal, Bank Transfer, Stripe (credit cards/debit cards) and SOFORT, Bitcoins (via BitPay) or Pay by Invoice.
We manually screen every order against two Fraud Detection sources. Hence don’t order with Proxy, VPN or Fake details, Fraud orders will be refunded. In rare cases it could be false positive where manually checks will be initiated.
Setup is within 6 hours after order approval, unless we go out of stock.
Our Terms and Conditions https://cspacehostings.com/terms/

NETWORK / DATA CENTERS:
We operate our own Network in Tallinn, Estonia which is AS208367. Our network provides customers with a blend of carriers such as Cogent, Elisa and CITIC-NTT and PITER-IX. You can test our network with our Looking Glass or downloading from our mirror server. These VPS will be hosted at Infonet DC (Tallinn, Estonia).

QUESTIONS / CUSTOMIZATION:
Need Help? Need Custom Plan for VPN operators?
You can reach out to us at sales@cspacehostings.com or Live Chat with our sales team on our website during Business hours (09:00 to 18:00 GMT +2).
